caption.title: αS membrane-associated aggregation in LBs and models thereof.
caption.p:
a Vesicle-rich membranous αS aggregation in the αS::GFP expression model in yeast. Insert: immunogold staining for αS. Reprinted by permission from the National Academy of Sciences, USA
68 . b Vesicle- and tubule-rich membranous αS aggregation in the αS 3K neuroblastoma cell model. Reprinted from Dettmer et al.
12 (CC-BY license). c Vesicle/membrane/lipid-rich αS aggregation in human Lewy bodies. Reprinted by permission from the Springer Publishing Group.
13
